question.label: Mailing address
question.helpText:
Please select if your mailing address is a Street address or a Post office box. A post office box also includes GPO, Private bag, Locked bag and other Australia Post classifications. Simply enter the prefix and then click "Verify your address".

If you are unable to find your address, enter fewer details e.g. remove the unit number or postcode and try again.

If you cannot locate your address please call us on 1300 657 627.

add.value: Please enter a valid email address.
Email addrss is too long. (Maximum 50 characters)

question.label: Unit number
question.helpText: Please enter the number for your unit, apartment, flat etc.

question.label: Post box number
question.helpText: Please enter your PO Box, GPO, Private bag, Locked bag or other Australia Post classification number.

question.label: House number
question.helpText: Please enter the number of your home.

question.label: Street
question.helpText: Please enter your street name including the type e.g. street, road, court etc.

add.value: First name can be a maximum of [%MAX_LENGTH%] characters.
The first name contains invalid characters.
Middle name can be a maximum of [%MAX_LENGTH%] characters.
The middle name contains invalid characters.
Last name can be a maximum of [%MAX_LENGTH%] characters.
The last name contains invalid characters.

question.label: Please confirm your date of birth

generalItems.error: Please enter your date of birth (dd-mm-yyyy).
Unfortunately we are unable to complete your request please call 1300 657 627 for assistance.
generalItems.item:
Thank you

You have successfully updated your personal details. These changes will be reflected in your membership and roadside assistance records.

Policy address(s)

If you have updated your address and this change also applies to your policy(s), please update where you keep your car for your car policies in My policies. Or for home insurance please call us on 1300 657 627 to change your address.

Other policyholders

Please ensure that other policyholders have also changed their mailing address if required.
